I'd highly recommend watching "Hitch" and "What Women Want".

"Hitch" is a fascinating film that revisits the meeting between the legendary Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut, offering an insightful look into their discussion about cinema history.

On the other hand, "What Women Want" is a comedy starring Mel Gibson as a chauvinistic advertising executive who discovers he can hear women's thoughts, leading to some hilarious and heartwarming situations. Both movies are worth checking out!
